alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Eastern Loudoun; Frederick; Northern Fauquier; Shenandoah; Warren; Western Loudoun (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 28 at 1:22PM EST until January 29 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Portions of central Maryland, northern and northwest Virginia and eastern and panhandle West Virginia. * WHEN...Until 1 AM EST Saturday. The steadiest snow is expected from late this afternoon through this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures will fall below freezing for most areas during the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

area.areaDesc: Clarke; Eastern Loudoun; Frederick; Northern Fauquier; Shenandoah; Warren; Western Loudoun
